includedAssets.title: 12 Rounds
includedAssets.synopsis: WWE hero John Cena teams up with Die Hard 2 and The Long Kiss Goodnight director Renny Harlin for a non-stop thrill ride through the streets of New Orleans. Cena is Danny Fisher, a cop whose life becomes hell when a notorious criminal seeks revenge by kidnapping his girl. To find his love, Danny must negotiate a series of traps and clues, the 12 rounds of the title, left by the mad mastermind. Game of Thrones' Aidan Gillen is on bad guy duties in this high-speed, rough-and-tumble actionfest.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When his girlfriend is kidnapped, cop John Cena must complete 12 perilous challenges in order to save her life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: WWE hero John Cena teams up with Die Hard 2 and The Long Kiss Goodnight director Renny Harlin for a non-stop thrill ride through the streets of New Orleans. Cena is Danny Fisher, a cop whose life becomes hell when a notorious criminal seeks revenge by kidnapping his girl. To find his love, Danny must negotiate a series of traps and clues, the 12 rounds of the title, left by the mad mastermind. Game of Thrones' Aidan Gillen is on bad guy duties in this high-speed, rough-and-tumble actionfest.

includedAssets.title: 12 Rounds 2: Reloaded
includedAssets.synopsis: Randy Orton stars as a paramedic who is given 12 testing challenges he must pass to save his wife's life.

includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: 12 Rounds Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: A detective and a paramedic take on impossible odds to save their loved ones and defeat a pair of vengeful villains in high-risk, 12-round games of life or death. A double helping of full-throttle action from WWE studios. Wrestlers John Cena and Randy Orton star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two tough guys take on a pair of vengeful villains in 12 brutal tests to save their loved ones. Action double-bill with John Cena and Randy Orton.
